participant_1.background:
I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym.
i drive a blue honda civic.
i have a set of identical twin brothers.
My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms.
I am not the superstitious type, but my friends are always trying to get me to go to a fortune teller.

participant_2.background:
I would love to learn how to play the guitar like the Red Hot Chili Peppers.
My family is very supportive of my career and loves that I get to be creative everyday.
I am a good welder and have a knack for making new friends.
I have a rocking chair that I like to sit in while reading to my children.
I want to sell my paintings to make money.

content.text: Hello there! I am a personal trainer and enjoy having my nieces and nephews over to play in my home gym. What about you?
Hi there! I am a welder and enjoy making things, and my family is really supportive of my career. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the gym, read books, and I am trying to teach myself how to play the guitar. What about you?
I love to play guitar too, but I am not very good at it. I would love to learn how to play like the Red Hot Chili Peppers. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fiction, non-fiction, and self-help books. What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is "The Great Gatsby." I love the way the story is told and the characters are so well developed. What is your favorite book?
I have not read that book, but I have heard good things about it. My favorite book is "The Alchemist" by Paulo Coelho. I love the message of the book and the way the story is told.
I have heard of that book, but I have not read it yet. I will have to check it out. Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I like to go to the beach, watch movies, and spend time with my family. What about you?
I like to go to the beach too. I also like to go camping, hiking, and kayaking. I love being outdoors.
I love being outdoors too. I love to go for walks in the park and explore new places.
Me too! I think we would be good friends.
